name: Alien Reanimation
effect: Life, gift of the cosmos granted once more to a fallen alien beast, so that it may serve thankfully

name: Anti-Gravity Field
effect: Generate a localized field of intense low gravity, and behold a planet's true power.

name: Create Vacuum
effect: Gut the O2 supply of targets in the area for a duration

name: Creators' Peace
effect: Fill your foes with the silent calm of the universe, compelling them to temporarily abandon their weapons

name: Earthbound
effect: Change the gravity around you to Earth gravity levels for a duration

name: Elemental Pull
effect: Elements, the true treasure of planet and moon, are drawn to your being

name: Eternal Harvest
effect: Regrows flora that has been harvested in a large area around you

name: Grav Dash
effect: Manipulate gravity to propel yourself forward, and briefly increase any damage you inflict

name: Gravity Wave
effect: Emit a gravitational force strong enough to propel almost anything... or anyone

name: Gravity Well
effect: Create an area of dense gravity that pulls in and crushes everything and everyone in around it

name: Inner Demon
effect: Force an enemy to confront their inner demons, creating a mirror image of themselves that attacks them

name: Life Forced
effect: Drain the life force out of a living being and transfer it to yourself

name: Moon Form
effect: Become as strong as stone, rooting yourself in place and increasing your resistance to all damages greatly

name: Parallel Self
effect: From across the vast multiverse, a friendly version of yourself arrives, armed and ready to lend aid

name: Particle Beam
effect: Shoot a beam of pure particle energy that deals high amounts of damage to enemies in front of you

name: Personal Atmosphere
effect: Oxygen, pure and clean, brought forth to breathe deep and counteract harmful carbon dioxide

name: Phased Time
effect: Phase through the normal flow of time and slow down the universe for a duration

name: Precognition
effect: Bend time and glimpse the future, seeing the path someone will walk and the words they may say

name: Reactive Shield
effect: Form a shield of pure cosmic light that can weaken and even reflect enemy projectiles

name: Sense Star Stuff
effect: Bind yourself to the particles of creation, sensing the life force of any human, alien, or Starborn

name: Solar Flare
effect: Tap into the power of a sun and release a directed orb of searing hot plasma

name: Sunless Space
effect: Shoot a ball of ice as cold as space into an area, freezing any living being caught in the blast for a duration

name: Supernova
effect: Explode with the power of a supernova in an area around you, dealing massive damage

name: Void Form
effect: Warp the light around you, becoming nearly invisible for a duration
